title: what is this?
body:
I have an error when starting a game that does not allow me to reconnect and I end up being FK please help

Link:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1769791209942279/?multi_permalinks=2066443553610375&notif_id=1529069854034953&notif_t=feedback_reaction_generic

replies.body: Likely related to content discussed in [this ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you still have issues.
